content.text:
# Draft:Vishnu Pavithreswaram

Vishnu Pavithreswaram is an Indian politician and Entrepreneur from Kerala, He is a member of the Indian National Congress
Life record and education
Vishnu Pavithreswaram was born on 30 January 1996 in Pavithreswaram, Kottarakkara to Sri Vijayan Pillai and Smt. Aruna Devi. He has an sister, Aiswarya Lekshmi.
Vishnu Pavithreswaram did his schooling at St. Thevodorose Orthodox School, Madavassery  in puthoor and at KNNMVHSS School in Pavithreswaram. He then graduated with a bachelor's degree in Biochemistry from the N. S. S. College, Pandalam.
Political career
Vishnu Pavithreswaram began his political career in 2010 as a member of the Kerala Students Union (KSU) while pursuing his undergraduate studies at N. S. S. College, Pandalam. In 2013,He served as the General Secretary of the KSU unit in NSS College during 2014-16. He was appointed as a Vice President of Kerala Students Union Kunnathoor Assembly constituency and also assumed the role of Vice President for the Indian Youth Congress in the Pavithreswaram mandalam committee. In 2023, He was elected as the Kollam District Secratary of the Indian Youth Congress , Kerala.
